infoCards.heading: What do we do?
infoCards.intro: The Unique Application Models Laboratory (P.U.M.A.) works at the intersection of pharmaceuticals, medicine, biology, computer science and technology. We create computational and experimental models to help better understand diseases and find more effective treatments.

basicScience.title: Basic science
basicScience.description: Fundamental research in microbiology, bioengineering and molecular medicine.

translational.title: Translational research
translational.description: Translating scientific discoveries into practical clinical and therapeutic solutions.

innovation.title: Implementation innovations
innovation.description: Commercialization of research results and implementation of new technologies in industry.

biofilm.title: Biofilm models
biofilm.description: In vitro, ex vivo and in vivo, including using Galleria mellonella larvae.

biomaterials.title: Testing biomaterials
biomaterials.description: Testing of biomaterials - dressings, drug carriers.

translational.title: Translational research
translational.description: Translational research on the efficacy of antiseptics, antibiotics, dressings, and naturally derived compounds evaluated using the aforementioned models.

efficacy.title: Efficacy and safety analysis
efficacy.description: Preclinical efficacy and safety analysis using alternative models to mammalian studies.

ai.title: Artificial intelligence in biology
ai.description: We are using AI algorithms to analyze the movement patterns of Galleria mellonella larvae as a response to toxic substances, including psychoactive substances, and to evaluate the efficacy of anti-infective drugs and drug safety.

features.heading: Why P.U.M.A.?
features.subtitle: P.U.M.A. is a team of scientists who work efficiently, quickly and flexibly - like the catfish from which we took our name.

fast.title: Quick and efficient
fast.description: We operate efficiently without unnecessary bureaucracy

flexible.title: Barrier-free
flexible.description: We have no rigid framework or limitations

complete.title: From idea to implementation
complete.description: We support projects at every stage

interdisciplinary.title: Interdisciplinarity
interdisciplinary.description: We combine different fields of science and practice

features.closing: If a science and technology problem arises in your clinic, company, start-up or during the implementation of a grant, you want to validate an idea, solve nagging questions or modernize an existing solution - we are here to do it.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: Learn about the team's scientific achievements

cta.heading: Do you have a research idea?
cta.description: Regardless of the stage of the project - from conception to analysis of the results - we can help with its execution, implementation and publication.
